lines.text: You got a squeaky wheel on that Pokécycle there.
Y'oughta bring that there vehicle into my workshop for an overhaul.
What you want to go chasin' Pokémon for? Got some real nice cars to fix in here.
There's nothin' more satisfyin' than a day under the bonnet of a broke-down car!
I need me a holiday. Crawlin' under cars all day gets a bit tiresome.
How about you take over my workshop for a spell? I need a rest.
I just love the smell of axel grease in the mornin'!
Come back sometime with that Pokécycle of yours. I'll have her hummin' sweetly!
